main_definition: Shoppers are people who go to stores or shopping centers to purchase goods or services.

meanings_and_examples.example: The shoppers browsed through the aisles of the grocery store, comparing prices and products.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals looking for bargains or sales items
meanings_and_examples.example: During Black Friday sales, shoppers flock to stores in search of discounted electronics and clothing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Consumers who shop online through e-commerce platforms
meanings_and_examples.example: Online shoppers order their groceries from a popular delivery service, saving them time and effort.
